turkish_example_sentence: Biz bu kadar yorgun olmasak, akşam konsere giderdik.
english_example_sentence: If we were not this tired, we would go to the concert in the evening.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы не были так усталы, мы бы пошли на концерт вечером.
